data.enText: listening/looking carefully
the act of listening to, looking at or thinking about sth/sb carefully
the report's attention to detail

data.chText: 他把注意力转回到道路上。
data.enText: He turned his attention back to the road again.

data.chText: 幼儿的注意力持续时间很短。
data.enText: Small children have a very short attention span .
Please pay attention (= listen carefully) to what I am saying.
Don't pay any attention to what they say (= don't think that it is important) .

data.chText: 她试图引起服务员的注意。
data.enText: She tried to attract the waiter's attention .

data.chText: 我尽量使人不察觉到我论证中的弱点。
data.enText: I tried not to draw attention to (= make people notice) the weak points in my argument.

data.chText: 报上一篇文章引起了我的注意。
data.enText: An article in the newspaper caught my attention .

data.chText: 我不能一心一意地关注这个方案。
data.enText: I couldn't give the programme my undivided attention .
It has come to my attention (= I have been informed) that…

data.chText: 他提请（他们）注意许多档案已经遗失这一事实。
data.enText: He called (their) attention to the fact that many files were missing.
Can I have your attention please?
interest
interest that people show in sb/sth

data.chText: 有大明星演出的电影总是引起很大的兴趣。
data.enText: Films with big stars always attract great attention .

data.chText: 身为幼女，她一直是大家关注的中心。
data.enText: As the youngest child, she was always the centre of attention .
things that sb does to try to please you or to show their interest in you

data.chText: 她尽量避开她过去男朋友多余的殷勤。
data.enText: She tried to escape the unwanted attentions of her former boyfriend.
treatment
special care, action or treatment
She was in need of medical attention.
The roof needs attention (= needs to be repaired) .

data.chText: 由…办理（正式信件信封上的用语）
data.enText: for the attention of… (= written on the envelope of an official letter to say who should deal with it)
soldiers
the position soldiers take when they stand very straight with their feet together and their arms at their sides
to stand at/to attention
used for asking people to listen to sth that is being announced

data.chText: 请注意！请KL412航班的乘客立即到21号门登机。
data.enText: Attention, please! Passengers for flight KL412 are requested to go to gate 21 immediately.
used for ordering soldiers to stand to attention

simple_means.memory_skill: at 加强 + tent 伸展 + ion 表状态 → 伸展出去〔听别人讲〕→ 注意力

ex.chText: 学生们全神贯注地听老师讲课。
ex.enText: The students paid close attention to the teacher's lecture.

ex.chText: 他的注意力其实不在比赛上。
ex.enText: His attention wasn't really on the game.

synonyms.bx: 指认真地听、看、思考等时的专注。

ex.chText: 你必须注意人们怎么说。
ex.enText: You must take heed of what people say.

ex.chText: 她根本没有理会他的警告。
ex.enText: She paid no heed to his warning.

synonyms.bx: 指对他人的意见、建议、警告等的重视或考虑，常和 give/pay/take等动词搭配使用。

ex.enText: Please take note of what I say.

ex.chText: 人们开始注意到他的歌唱才能。
ex.enText: People were beginning to take note of his talents as a singer.

synonyms.bx: 常用于 take note (of sth) 结构中，以表示注意到某事物并将其铭记在心。

ex.chText: 他的新书引起了公众对他的注意。
ex.enText: His new book brought him to public notice.

synonyms.bx: 指对所见、所闻的人或事物作出的反应，侧重结果。

tr: the work of providing treatment for or attending to someone or something
example: the old car needs constant attention
she tried to win his heart with her many attentions

tr: a motionless erect stance with arms at the sides and feet together
assumed by military personnel during drill or review
the faculty or power of mental concentration
example: keeping track of all the details requires your complete attention

tr: the process whereby a person concentrates on some features of the environment to the (relative) exclusion of others
a general interest that leads people to want to know more
example: She was the center of attention

value.def: If you give someone or something your attention, you look at it, listen to it, or think about it carefully.

example.ex: Later he turned his attention to the desperate state of housing in the province.
example.tran: 其后，他将注意力转向了该省形势严峻的住房问题。
很难长时间保持注意力集中的小孩子

gramarinfo.label: also N in pl, usu with poss

value.def: Attention is great interest that is shown in someone or something, particularly by the general public.

example.ex: Volume Two, subtitled 'The Lawyers', will also attract considerable attention...
example.tran: 副标题为“律师”的第二册也将获得广泛关注。

example.ex: The conference may help to focus attention on the economy.
example.tran: 此次会议可能有助于将关注焦点放在经济上。

value.def: If someone or something is getting attention, they are being dealt with or cared for.

example.ex: Each year more than two million household injuries need medical attention.
example.tran: 每年有超过200万起家中受伤事件需要医疗处理。

example.ex: ...a demanding baby who seems to want attention 24 hours a day.
example.tran: 好像一天24小时都要人照看的难缠的宝宝

value.def: You can refer to someone's efforts to help you, or the interest they show in you, as their attentions, especially if you dislike or disapprove of them.

example.ex: The only way to escape the unwanted attentions of the local men was not to go out...
example.tran: 避免被当地人指指点点的唯一办法就是闭门不出。

example.ex: The meeting was held away from the attentions of the media...
example.tran: 会议的举行避开了媒体的关注。

example.ex: Some men are flattered by the attentions of a young woman.
example.tran: 年轻女性的倾心会使一些男人飘飘然起来。

value.def: If you bring something to someone's attention or draw their attention to it, you tell them about it or make them notice it.

example.ex: If we don't keep bringing this to the attention of the people, nothing will be done...
example.tran: 如果我们无法让群众一直关注此事，那将一事无成。

example.ex: We conclude by drawing attention to the issues around which the debate should focus.
example.tran: 我们作总结时着重提到了辩论应该关注的一些问题。

value.def: If someone or something attracts your attention or catches your attention, you suddenly notice them.

example.ex: A faint aroma of coffee attracted his attention...
example.tran: 淡淡的咖啡香味一下子吸引了他。

example.ex: He sat at one of the round tables and tried to attract her attention.
example.tran: 他坐在其中一张圆桌旁边，想引起她的注意。

value.def: If you pay attention to someone, you watch them, listen to them, or take notice of them. If you pay no attention to someone, you behave as if you are not aware of them or as if they are not important.

example.ex: More than ever before, the food industry is paying attention to young consumers...
example.tran: 食品工业比以往任何时候都更加关注年轻消费者。

example.ex: Other people walk along the beach at night, so I didn't pay any attention at first...
example.tran: 入夜后还有人在沙滩上散步，起先我并没注意到。

example.ex: I was living just for myself and paying little attention to God.
example.tran: 我过去只为自己活，哪管上帝怎么想。

value.tran: 关心/不关心；注意/不注意

value.def: When people stand to attention or stand at attention, they stand straight with their feet together and their arms at their sides.

example.ex: Soldiers in full combat gear stood at attention...
example.tran: 全副武装的士兵们立正站着。

example.ex: The waiters stood to attention with napkins folded over their arms.
example.tran: 服务员笔直站立着，餐巾折叠着放在他们的手臂上。

trans: 关注；注意；注意对手；集中注意力；重视
注意；的注意；对…的注意；对....注意
重视；更加注意；更注意；注重；多加注意

partsOfSpeech.dec: at 加强 + tend 伸展 → 延伸〔服务〕→ 看护
attend 出席；看护 + ant …的，具有…性质的 → 出席的
at 加强 + tent 伸展 + ion 表状态 → 伸展出去〔听别人讲〕→ 注意力
at 表加强 + tent 伸展 + ive …的 → 注意的；关心的
con 共同 + tend 伸展 → 一起伸展〔个人观点〕→ 争论
dis 分散 + tend 伸展 →〔向各个方向〕分散伸展 → 扩张
ex 出 + tend 伸展 → 伸出去 → 扩张
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 伸展；延期
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ive 有…性质的 → 可四处伸展的 → 广泛的
ex 出 + tent 伸展 →〔身体〕伸展开 → 程度
in 使… + tend 伸展 → 使〔想法〕伸展 → 打算
in 不 + tens 伸展 + e → 拉到了不能再拉的地步 → 强烈的
intens〔e〕强烈的 + ify 使 → 加强
in 不 + tent 伸展 → 意图
in 不 + tent 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 意图
pre 前 + tend 伸展 → 向前伸手 → 假装〔乞讨〕
pre 预先 + tent 伸展 + ious …的 → 将优势伸展 → 自负的
tend 伸展 + ence 表状态 → 伸展的状态 → 趋向
tend 伸展 + ency 表状态 → 倾向
tens 伸展 + ible 可…的 → 可伸展的
tens 伸展 + ion 表名词 → 伸展到极点 → 张力
